metadata.title: CVE-2024-27433 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:clk: mediatek: mt7622-apmixedsys: Fix an error handling path inclk_mt8135_apmixed_probe()'clk_data' is allocated with mtk_devm_alloc_clk_data(). So callingmtk_free_clk_data() explicitly in the remove function would lead to adouble-free.Remove the redundant call.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
